thread.title: Emmy Nominated Costume Designer Rita McGhee of the hit FOX Series EMPIRE is speaking
thread.title_full: Emmy Nominated Costume Designer Rita McGhee of the hit FOX Series EMPIRE is speaking | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Emmy Nominated Costume Designer Rita McGhee of the hit FOX Series EMPIRE is speaking
text:
(MENAFN Press) 





LOS ANGELES CA – July 29 2015 – Emmy Nominated Costume Designer Rita McGhee of the hit FOX Series "EMPIRE" is speaking at The Koffa Design Group Saturday August 29th 2015 to discuss her career in Fashion and Entertainment and her role as the Costume Designer for the hit show EMPIRE. 

Rita McGhee a Howard University Alumni has over 20 years of experience on shows such as 'Martin' 'Sunday's Best' 'Reed between the lines' 'Let's Stay Together' 'Love That Girl' 'Fake it til you make it' and Featured Films such as 'Woman Thou Art Loosed' 'King's Ransom' 'Biker Boys' 'All About Us' 'Next Day Air' 'Fear of the Black Hat' 'Book of Love' and 'My Brother's Keeper'. 

Learn about her at http://ritamcghee.com 

See you at this amazing event as seating for this event is very limited. 

Press Q and A from 2:00 pm-2:20 pm PST 

Doors open at 2:20 PST 

Rita Talks at 2:30-3:30 pm PST 

3:30 pm-4:00 pm Red Carpet Pictures PST 

The Koffa Design Group is located at 2525 East Colorado Blvd Suite 112 and can be reached via email at info@thekoffadg.com 

Read full story at http://pressreleasejet.com/newsreleases/2015/emmy-nominated-costume-designer-rita-mcghee-of-the-hit-fox-series-empire-is-speaking-at-the-koffa-design-group-in-pasadena-ca/
